personal_info.name: Sarthak Singh
personal_info.title: Senior Associate | Data Scientist
personal_info.bio: Data Scientist with 3 years of experience in designing and deploying data‑driven solutions using AWS and AI technologies. Proven track record in developing robust ETL pipelines, creating conversational AI agents, and optimizing cloud‑based systems. Skilled in Python, AWS, and machine learning, with a strong foundation in mathematics and computing.

projects.title: Vendor Compliance Agent
projects.description: Designed an agentic workflow using OpenSearch, LangChain, and Bedrock to evaluate third-party vendor evidence for compliance, generate comprehensive gap analyses, and develop a custom evaluator—reducing evaluation time by 99%

projects.title: GenAI Data Classification Agent
projects.description: GenAI agent leveraging OpenSearch and SageMaker to convert raw data into schema and classify into correct event categories. Achieved 50% performance improvement with custom embedding model.

projects.title: AI Threat Hunting Agent
projects.description: Conversational AI agent for MITRE ATT&CK analysis on Security Lake data, enhancing threat investigation and mitigation. Reduced threat investigation speed by 45%.

projects.title: FPL Toolset
projects.description: Fantasy Premier League team building website using data from Understat and FPL APIs, with an agentic chatbot for real-time team news updates using Langraph and Gemini.

projects.title: GenAI Career Assistant
projects.description: AI-powered career assistant using Langraph and Gemini, with tools like DuckDuckGo for real-time information retrieval. Enables structured learning, resume building, interview preparation, and job search assistance.

projects.title: Anomaly Detection System
projects.description: Unsupervised anomaly detection using Isolation Forest and DBSCAN on Okta login data for cybersecurity platform processing 10M+ data points daily.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation ML Model
projects.description: XGBoost-based machine learning model deployed in SageMaker to identify high-potential customers for outbound campaigns using internal customer data.

experience.description: Data Scientist designing and deploying data‑driven solutions using AWS and AI technologies. Proven track record in developing robust ETL pipelines, creating conversational AI agents, and optimizing cloud‑based systems.
Built Markov Model for Reliability and Availability Analysis of Degrading Systems under Imperfect Repair Scenario. Achieved 10.84% gain in system availability for 50,000-hour mission period.

certifications: Generative AI with Large Language Models (DeepLearning.AI)
PwC Star Team and Individual Award (2024)
